column3:
there's two other mentions of the old name, maybe adopt those too
```
src/wallet/wallet.cpp:    // If wallet doesn't have a chain (e.g wallet-tool), lock can't be taken.
src/wallet/wallet.cpp:    // tx status. If lock can't be taken (e.g wallet-tool), tx confirmation
```

Please [squash your commits](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits) and update to use a commit message like `doc: rename wallet-tool references to bitcoin-wallet`.
